abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights mobile applications that aid stargazers in understanding the night sky.
lead_paragraph: A series of apps fill in information on the darkened sky, from red dwarf stars to the International Space Station.

headline.main: Video Feature: Astronomy Apps for Getting to Know the Starry Night Skies
headline.print_headline: A Guided Tour Through the Galaxy

snippet: A series of apps fill in information on the darkened sky, from red dwarf stars to the International Space Station.
